verses.roman:
nūpurera dhvani-mātra āmāra śunibā
sei śabde āmāra gamana pratīti karibā

synonyms: nūpurera—of the ankle bells; dhvani-mātra—the sound only; āmāra—My; śunibā—you will hear; sei śabde—by hearing that sound; āmāra—My; gamana—coming; pratīti—understanding; karibā—you will do.
translation: "You will know that I am walking behind you by the sound of My ankle bells.
